BALI JUNGLE HOPPER PACKAGES

BALI JUNGLE HOPPER PACKAGES IS A BALI SAFARI AND MARINE PARK TOUR PACKAGES BY OFFER UNFORGETTABLE TOUR AND EDUCATION EXPERIENCE AMONG THE MORE THAN 100 SPECIES OF ANIMAL

Jungle Hopper Packages is one of Bali Safari and Marine Park packages which very famous for visitors who comes to this place. The packages offers an unforgettable tour and education experience among the more than 100 species of animals housed at the recreational park and active wildlife conservation center, Bali Safari Marine Park. Book this package and get one time Safari Journey Trip, Animals Presentation, Harimau Presentation, Elephant Presentation and see many kinds of animal in the park and beautiful bird in the biggest safari park in Bali Islands. The Jungle Hopper package is our number one selling ticket! This popular Safari package embarks you on an adventure in the wildlife to encounter a wide variety of animals, even endangered species. Enjoy visiting the largest zoo on the island of Bali, with a variety of animal species that can be seen here, from the endangered, exotic and adorable here.

Most Choice Jungle Hopper Packages

When you are on vacation in Bali, it feels incomplete if you don't visit this Bali Safari and marine park, where here we offer the Jungle Hopper package, where you will be invited to tour the park and see the animal life here whose habitat is adapted to their habitat in the wild, see The tiger, elephant and animal show here will complete your curiosity about the zoo on the island of Bali and end by watching the Bali Agung dance show here, while the duration of this package is around one day tour from morning to evening. Filled holiday in Bali and visiting Bali Safari & Marine Park, select a package Jungle Hopper. You will be invited adventure and a close look at endangered species of wild life. The combination of Balinese culture that is strong and wild, creating an impression that will not be forgotten

Bali Jungle Hopper Program

This Jungle Hopper program is a very popular program, first you will ride a shuttle tram to get around this zoo area, guided by a professional guide who will explain every animal we meet in their habitat, we will see a variety of animals including wild animals like the lion found in this zoo via the shuttle car, continued to watch the tiger show here, delivered very beautifully with an amazing story that will make you so fascinated, continued to see the elephant show that is here with performers who bring the storyline so beautifully and add a sense of humor so it's not boring, continue watching the animal shows that are here that will make you or you fascinated by the intelligence of these animals, continue watching the bali agung show which is here with amazing stories sung by the dancers will make you more comfortable, and after that you can go around the park to spend time, and after that return to the hotel with a very impressive experience in the jungle hopper tour at Bali Safari and Marine Park
